markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Repulsion Resin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=832)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66</row>

**Price** 1,650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clear, tasteless tar causes the victim to emit waves of harmful mental energy that repel other creatures. Desperate users might consume this poison to keep enemies at bay despite the poison's debilitating effects. While you're [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) from this poison, a creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of you or approaches within 10 feet of you must attempt a DC 35 Will saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't voluntarily move closer to you; this is a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect. Once the approaching creature has attempted to save, it uses the same result for all saves from that dose of _repulsion resin_.

 **Saving Throw** DC 38 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 12d6 mental damage and stupefied 1 (1 minute); **Stage 2** 16d6 poison damage and stupefied 1 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 20d6 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 minute)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_repulsion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=254).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Repulsion Resin
